Package com.gniot.crs.dao

Interface UserDAOInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserDAOImpl
public interface UserDAOInterface
UserDAOInterface defines the data access operations related to user management in the course registration system.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    changePassword(String username, String oldPassword, String newPassword, String role)
    Changes the password for a user.
    void
    login(String username, String password, String role)
    Authenticates a user based on their username, password, and role.
    void
    register(Student student)
    Registers a new student in the system.

  • Method Details

    • register

      void register(Student student) throws SQLException
      Registers a new student in the system.
      Parameters:
      student - The student object containing details of the student to be registered.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs during registration.

    • login

      void login(String username, String password, String role) throws Exception
      Authenticates a user based on their username, password, and role.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user attempting to log in.
      password - The password of the user attempting to log in.
      role - The role of the user (e.g., student, professor) attempting to log in.
      Throws:
      Exception - if authentication fails or an error occurs.

    • changePassword

      void changePassword(String username, String oldPassword, String newPassword, String role) throws Exception
      Changes the password for a user.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user whose password is to be changed.
      oldPassword - The current password of the user.
      newPassword - The new password to be set for the user.
      role - The role of the user (e.g., student, professor) whose password is being changed.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the password change fails or an error occurs.
